org.jetel.graph.runtime.tracker

Interface ComponentTokenTracker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicComponentTokenTracker, ComplexComponentTokenTracker, CopyComponentTokenTracker, DenormalizerComponentTokenTracker, FileOperationComponentTokenTracker, PrimitiveComponentTokenTracker, ReaderWriterComponentTokenTracker, ReformatComponentTokenTracker

    public interface ComponentTokenTracker
    Component token tracker is used by components for token life-cycle tracking.
    See Also:
    TokenTracker, Node.getTokenTracker()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void eofInputPort(int portNum)
      This method informs token tracker about EOF on an input port.
      void eofOutputPort(int portNum)
      This method informs token tracker about EOF on an output port.
      void executeJob(DataRecord token, JobType jobType, IAuthorityProxy.RunStatus runStatus)
      A job was executed by a token.
      void freeToken(DataRecord token)
      Token is released and no other token tracking is expected.
      void initToken(DataRecord token)
      New token is registered and unique token identifier is generated.
      void jobFinished(DataRecord token, JobType jobType, IAuthorityProxy.RunStatus runStatus)
      A job finished with a token.
      void linkTokens(DataRecord sourceToken, DataRecord targetToken)
      Two given tokens are considered with parent-child relationship.
      void logMessage(DataRecord token, org.apache.log4j.Level level, java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable exception)
      General tracking message for a token
      void readToken(int inputPort, DataRecord token)
      Given token was read by component from a port.
      void unifyTokens(DataRecord sourceToken, DataRecord targetToken)
      Token identification of two given tokens is synchronized.
      void writeToken(int outputPort, DataRecord token)
      Given token was written by component to a port.

    • Method Detail

      • initToken

        void initToken(DataRecord token)
        New token is registered and unique token identifier is generated. This method should be called in case a new token is created.

      • freeToken

        void freeToken(DataRecord token)
        Token is released and no other token tracking is expected.

      • readToken

        void readToken(int inputPort,
             DataRecord token)
        Given token was read by component from a port.

      • writeToken

        void writeToken(int outputPort,
              DataRecord token)
        Given token was written by component to a port.

      • eofInputPort

        void eofInputPort(int portNum)
        This method informs token tracker about EOF on an input port. This method is invoked automatically by JobflowEdge.

      • eofOutputPort

        void eofOutputPort(int portNum)
        This method informs token tracker about EOF on an output port. This method is invoked automatically by JobflowEdge.

      • linkTokens

        void linkTokens(DataRecord sourceToken,
              DataRecord targetToken)
        Two given tokens are considered with parent-child relationship.

      • executeJob

        void executeJob(DataRecord token,
              JobType jobType,
              IAuthorityProxy.RunStatus runStatus)
        A job was executed by a token.
        Parameters:
        token - caused token
        jobType - type of executed job
        runId - run identifier of executed job
        settings - custom information about executed job

      • jobFinished

        void jobFinished(DataRecord token,
               JobType jobType,
               IAuthorityProxy.RunStatus runStatus)
        A job finished with a token.
        Parameters:
        token - reported token
        jobType - type of finished job
        runId - run identifier of finished job
        result - custom information about finished job

      • logMessage

        void logMessage(DataRecord token,
              org.apache.log4j.Level level,
              java.lang.String message,
              java.lang.Throwable exception)
        General tracking message for a token
        Parameters:
        token - reporting token
        level - logging level
        message - reported message
        exception - caused exception

      • unifyTokens

        void unifyTokens(DataRecord sourceToken,
               DataRecord targetToken)
        Token identification of two given tokens is synchronized. Both tokens are from now considered equal.
